message_1: In a Public Goods Game, there are four players who each contribute money to a group project. The project costs $100 to complete, and each player receives a benefit of $40 when it is finished. If all four players contribute equally, how much money will each player contribute?
message_2:
If the project costs $100 to complete and there are four players contributing equally, then each player will contribute:

$100 / 4 = $25

So, each player will contribute $25 to the group project.
